text: Return of the Dream Canteen is the thirteenth studio album by the Red Hot Chili Peppers. It was released on October 14, 2022. It was produced by Rick Rubin. The band recorded the music on Return of the Dream Canteen and Unlimited Love at the same time. Unlimited Love was released earlier in 2022. Two singles from the album were released before it. These are "Tippa My Tongue" and "The Drummer". The album went to the number one spot on music charts in six countries. == Track listing == All songs written by Anthony Kiedis, Flea, John Frusciante, and Chad Smith. # "Tippa My Tongue" – 4:20 # "Peace and Love" – 4:03 # "Reach Out" – 4:11 # "Eddie" – 5:41 # "Fake as Fu@k" – 4:22 # "Bella" – 4:51 # "Roulette" – 4:57 # "My Cigarette" – 4:24 # "Afterlife" – 4:14 # "Shoot Me a Smile" – 3:42 # "Handful" – 4:00 # "The Drummer" – 3:22 # "Bag of Grins" – 5:06 # "La La La La La La La La" – 3:57 # "Copperbelly" – 3:44 # "Carry Me Home" – 4:13 # "In the Snow" – 5:55 == References == Category:2022 albums Category:Red Hot Chili Peppers albums Category:Rock albums
title: Return of the Dream Canteen
